Martin: re: destroying your entire life; 
Not to sound impudent, but I'm sure glad you are doing what you've been doing for a while - sharing all these doc's can only have a positive effect.  

I'm reminded of a quote I came across recently (in 'The Constant Gardener' I think) originally made by H.G. Wells: "Civilization is a race between disaster and education."

You're spreading education!

Personally, I'm really looking forward to seeing these doc's and I had to register to show my gratitude; thanks!

I usually don't drop a comment but in this case I think it's about time. Thank you for uploading this. 

I admire in some way what Oreo said in the end; "I don't want anyone to feel pity on me...I just. Nobody decided. No one forced me to become a junkie, a poor decision. It's the thing we have to live with"

But still you can't help it to feel pity for them. Ofc it's their decision, but still. That is a horrible way to live your life :-(
